title: Um does everyone get a mystery gift?
body:
^^^....well I've dc'd a lot of games...but im pretty sure I have that "positive behaviour" :/
um soo..does everyone get a mystery gift?
(btw, cottontail teemo ftw yeeee *notrly*)

replies.body: if you haven't been banned for 14 days or had a chat restriction then yes being banned for 1 day is fine as sometimes its internet problems and they can't always be helped
